item.title: University of California, Berkeley
item.description: Master in Information Management and System - Data Science and Machine Learning

item.title: Lahore University of Management Sciences
item.description: 1. Bachelors in Electrical and Computer Engineering - Class of 2018

item.title: Unsupervised Learning
item.description: Unsupervised learning. Principal components analysis (PCA). Derivations from maximum likelihood estimation, maximizing the variance, and minimizing the sum of squared projection errors. Eigenfaces for face recognition. The singular value decomposition (SVD) and its application to PCA. Clustering: k-means clustering aka Lloyd’s algorithm; k-medoids clustering; hierarchical clustering; greedy agglomerative clustering. Dendrograms. The geometry of high-dimensional spaces. Random projection. The pseudoinverse and its relationship to the singular value decomposition.
